name: Hide-n-Disable-comment-url-field
author: Sharad Chhetri

sections.description: This plugin will hide and disable the URL field from wordpress default comment form.I created this plugin after getting annoyed with spammers which were leaving its URL in Website Field of the comment form.I have taken the reference from WordPress codex . The plugin also works in Genesis Framework.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Hide_n_Disable_comment_url_field.zip from Plugins ‘Add New’ tab through the WordPress Admin dashboard Or unzip the Hide_n_Disable_comment_url_field.zip in wp-content/plugins
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What this plugin do ?

It simply hide and disable the URL field from WordPress inbuilt comment form. Just Activate the plugin and check the Comment Form, the Website URL field will be disabled and hidden.

Do this plugin alter any database table/database value ?

No.

Do this plugin slower down the page load speed ?

No.It is a simple plugin without any javascript,css,ajax coding.Neither it uses any image

Do this plugin tested with Studiopress Genesis Theme ?

Yes, it works with Studiopress Genesis Theme also.
